divs: Sighting DetailsAt first I thought they were geese and still wonder except they were alot bigger . So anyway they were going like 80 mph and werent flaping a wing and all in unisin . So what got me was what looks like lights on the rear . They were headed away during these shots . And like I say in a hurry ! UFO'S ?
